title: The Gothic Tarot Compendium
description: An essential key to understanding The Gothic Tarot, this book offers Vargo's personal insights concerning the mythological and occult symbolism hidden within the artwork. This comprehensive resource contains illustrations of all 78 cards of the Major and Minor Arcana, translates their symbolic meanings, and provides a detailed explanation of their personal significance, allowing readers to utilize The Gothic Tarot to its fullest divinatory potential. Includes detailed instructions regarding several traditional and original card layouts that reinforce the gothic theme of the artwork.
author: Joseph Iorillo
